column2: In 2019, the Domestic Violence Act 1995 was replaced by the Family Violence Act 2018. Most references in case law after 1 July 2019 will be to the Family Violence Act.
In 2019, the Domestic Violence Act 1995 was replaced by the Family Violence Act 2018. Most references in case law before 1 July 2019 will be to the Domestic Violence Act 1995.
See Alison Douglass mental capacity toolkit: http://www.alisondouglass.co.nz/
